content:
That sounds like a great plan! Mixing and matching frame styles can add a lot of visual interest to your "nerd cave" and create a unique display that reflects your personal style. Using a combination of wooden, metal, and plastic frames in different shapes and sizes will add texture, depth, and variety to your walls.

Custom framing is also a great idea for your more unusual posters and prints. It will not only ensure a perfect fit but also provide an opportunity to add extra details, such as special matting or fillets, to make the piece truly stand out.

Remember to have fun with the process and don't be afraid to experiment with different frame combinations and arrangements. You can also consider grouping similar frames together or creating a focal point with a statement piece.

If you're feeling overwhelmed or unsure about any aspect of the process, consider consulting with a professional framer or designer who can provide guidance and expertise.

Lastly, don't forget to step back and enjoy the fruits of your labor! Your "nerd cave" is a reflection of your passions and interests, and it should be a space that brings you joy and inspiration.

Good luck with your project, and I hope you'll share some photos of your finished "nerd cave"!
